inicio.descripcion: Backend Software Developer, focused on problem-solving and adapting to new technologies...

sobreMi.descripcion: I am Kendall Cordero, a professional passionate about Software development, with technical training in Electronics and Telecommunications. I am passionate about learning and facing new challenges. I have experience repairing electronic equipment, which has taught me to be patient and solve problems creatively. I easily adapt to new technologies and situations, and I am always looking to continue growing both professionally and personally.

Graphical interface for a music app.
